ygData.messageBody:
went reading through the other posts on fulcrum's board after grabbing the
URL for my last message...2 new recipes listed, +5 str all/gnome gloves, and
a catapult of unknown use, gloves trivial at 122, catapult higher...

http://pub7.ezboard.com/ffulcrumstinkeringforumsworkbench.showMessageRange?topicID=182.topic

Xillitil the
mebbe-a-bit-less-bored-with-tradeskills-but-waiting-til-they-settle-down-a-bit-still
of Povar
